Science or Social Sciences  
(iv) BSU and UNN require French, Literature in English 
and any other Arts subject.  
(v) CALABAR requires Literature in English, CRS and 
either History or Government.  
(vi) KWASU requires two (2) other Arts subjects.  
(vii) LAGOS accepts any other three (3) subjects from 
Arts or Social Sciences.  
(viii) OAU, IBADAN, EKSU, OOU, UNIZIK and ABSU 
accept any three (3) subjects from Arts and Social 
Sciences.  
(ix) UNIOSUN requires Government or History plus 
any other Arts Subjects.

DIRECT ENTRY  
(i) ABU accepts  
a) Two (2) ‘A’ level/IJMB passes in Hausa and 
any other relevant subject.  
b) NCE merit in Hausa.  
c) General English/Use of English at NCE 
satisfies the UTME English requirement.  
(ii) BAYERO, MAIDUGURI and UDU accept NCE with 
Hausa major.  
(iii) UMYUK accepts NCE credit in Hausa in addition to 
theUTMErequirementsat not more than two  
(2) sittings.  
  
UTME  
(i) ABU requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes to  
include English Language, Hausa and any three 
(3)Arts or Social Science subjects.  
(ii) BAYERO requires five (5) ‘O' level credit passes 
to include English Language, Hausa plus three (3) 
other subjects
